## General information

Implementation of [Vasicek](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vasicek_model), [Cox-Ingersoll-Ross](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cox%E2%80%93Ingersoll%E2%80%93Ross_model) and [Rendleman-Bartter](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rendleman%E2%80%93Bartter_model) models. SDE simulation uses [Euler-Maruyama](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euler%E2%80%93Maruyama_method) scheme. For examples see examples.ipynb. Data was downloaded from [here](https://data.ecb.europa.eu/data/datasets/FM/FM.M.U2.EUR.RT.MM.EURIBOR3MD_.HSTA?chart_).

## Usage
Too install dependencies on Linux, MacOS:

```bash
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
```

Code was linted by pylint:
```bash
pylint models.py
```
